name: order-template-list
description: Module to show list of order templates for a customer

imageSettings.description: Image settings for order template list

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

enableImageProductLink.friendlyName: Allow images to navigate to PDP
enableImageProductLink.description: This setting allows navigation to PDP when the image is selected.

emptyOrderTemplateText.comment: Text for the empty order template list
emptyOrderTemplateText.value: Your order template list is empty.

unableToGetOrderTemplateList.comment: Text for the not getting order template list
unableToGetOrderTemplateList.value: Unable to get order template list!

addToBagButtonText.comment: Text for the add to bag button

createNewTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for the create new template button

orderTemplateCreatedSuccessText.comment: Text for the success of creation new order template

orderTemplateCreationFailedText.comment: Text for Failed to create new order template
orderTemplateCreationFailedText.value: Failed to create new order template

deleteOrderTemplateFailedText.comment: Text for failed to delete order template

closeWindowButtonText.comment: Text for the close modal window button of adding order template

addToCartFailureMessage.comment: Message to show when order template adding to cart have fails
addToCartFailureMessage.value: Add to cart failed. Please refresh and retry

addToCartSuccessMessage.comment: Message to show when order template successfully added to cart
addToCartSuccessMessage.value: Order template successfully added to cart

addToCartProcessMessage.comment: Message to show when order template adding to cart

viewCartButtonText.comment: View cart text on item added to cart dialog

orderTemplateCloseButtonText.comment: Continue shopping on item added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderItemsOneText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderLinesOneText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderLinesFormatText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderMessageText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

createOrderTemplateHeader.comment: Text for create order template dialog header

orderTemplateTitle.comment: Text for create order template dialog title

orderTemplateNameAriaLabel.comment: Text for create order template dialog template name input aria label

createOrderTemplateDescription.value: Order templates will be saved to your account. You can reuse them in the future to speed up the checkout process. Create an order template and add this item to it.
createOrderTemplateDescription.comment: Text for create order template dialog description

createOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog create button

cancelNewOrderTemplateCreationButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog cancel button

defaultOrderTemplateName.comment: Text for create order template dialog default order template name
